I do not know what the hell that is, but it is no ordinary human!
I am the butler of this mansion.
I am the younger brother of D'Arby Elder, whom you have
You are the gambler D'Arby's younger brother?
Are you here to avenge your older brother?
I would not even think of it.
Did not my brother tell you
that the one who is fooled and loses the battle is at fault?
I believe that to be true, as well.
It is my brother's fault for losing.
I do not bear a grudge at all.
My brother is my brother, and I am myself.
I am ten years younger than my brother.
I did respect my brother to a certain degree,
but we are from different generations.
He had to cheat and swindle to win.
He could only defeat those who were either old-fashioned or amateurs.
I believe that Lord Dio also recognized this,
and that is why I am the one he chose to be his butler.
If you would like to fight me,
Everyone, do not rush in there carelessly.
We do not have much time.
Hurry up and take us to Dio.
H-Hey, he brought out his Stand!
Well, that is rare these days.
It is been a while since we faced someone who used their Stand out in the open.
Who shall be my first opponent?
Jotaro, beat the crap out of him!
The first blow Star Platinum uses against me
His first attack will be a punch thrown with his left arm.
It is all the same if you hit him with everything you have got!
Hurry up and hit him, Jotaro!
It seems I have lost this wager.
Just like my brother, I love gambling.
But I am not very good at it.
As a reward, I shall take you to an amazing world.
It was a trap after all!
It would be too dangerous to follow them!
If you do not hear from us in ten minutes, set the mansion on fire!
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Are we underground or above ground?
Just what is he trying to do?
It knew without doubt that I was going to throw a right punch.
Why do you think that is?
If we do not solve that mystery, this guy will beat us.
Would you like something to drink?
Of course, the drinks are real.
According to the Speedwagon Foundation's intel,
there are about two or three other Stand users.
Looks like we are not getting any straight answers.
But I do not tell lies or trick others, as my brother did.
So what are you getting at?
If we do not defeat you, we cannot proceed?
This man gets on my nerves.
Have you forgotten that it is one against three?
We are in a hurry, so all three of us will attack you.
Now, do not be in such a hurry.
Before that, let us have a look
Though it pales in comparison to my brother's, I also have a collection.
But one likes to hear compliments about their precious collection
Given that we are dealing with one
of the D'Arby brothers, those cannot be ordinary dolls.
My hobby is to make dolls.
And I have had real souls inhabit these dolls.
I am letting the cat out of the bag, but this is my Stand's power.
My brother simply enjoyed his soul coins, collected in little rows.
But that is rather simple and mundane.
I change their clothes and even talk to them.
I love hearing about her beautiful love stories.
She is so beautiful, I am never embarrassed to show her off.
I enjoy hearing about the patients he murdered.
I made his glasses and stethoscope myself.
The video game master from Japan, Tatsuhiko!
His IQ is 190, so he was formidable.
It was not easy to beat him and steal his soul.
Both of you brothers are insane.
No, you are much worse than your brother.
You are pissing me off more!
You act like a gentleman, but you are scum.
By the way, I am sure you experienced this when fighting my brother, but...
Once you admit defeat, your soul's energy drops almost to zero.
I watch for that moment, and then drag their souls out!
That is how both my brother and my Stands work.
You are just pissing me off.
We will hurry up and defeat you, then move forward!
Jotaro, you know you are already under my control.
Earlier, Jotaro, when I read whether you were
going to use your left or right, you were shocked, were not you?
And how I read it is still a mystery to you.
At that moment, though subtly, I was able to touch your soul.
What do you think I did when I touched it?
I left Atum's arm attached to your soul.
If I were to crush your right arm,
I am sure Lord Dio would be quite pleased.
But in that instant, I would be attacked by Kakyoin and Joestar,
I do not want that to happen.
Why do not we play a little game and wager our souls?
If I admit absolute defeat, I shall let go of his arm.
But you are going to regret tricking me, D'Arby.
I would absolutely love to hear you say,
I will play a game and wager my soul.
But the first to play will be...
Hey, what is the meaning of this?
You and Joestar are related by blood,
but you have no relation to Kakyoin.
If, after I steal the two Joestar souls,
Kakyoin lost interest in wagering his soul
and attacked me with his Stand, it would be troublesome for me.
You are so full of yourself.
You seem to think you have already won.
I shall be your first opponent.
I have experience with video games myself.
I would like to challenge you to F-Mega.
And I shall wager my soul!
You do not have to go first.
Since you have that thing attached to your arm,
it is likely you would mess up the game's controls.
that if you lose, your Stand will let go of Jotaro's arm?
There is nothing wrong with the TV, console, or game cartridges.
These are the same video games you could find anywhere else.
I am not like my brother.
Mine is 15, because I was born on January 5th.
Th-The way he is pushing the accel button over
and over again at such a fast speed...
He is trying for a start dash!
I am not going to be able to dash like this!
He is going to get ahead of me!
As long as I can keep this up, I will win.
It is impossible to get past me at this point.
And sadly, I, D'Arby, never make mistakes with controls in a race.
I see you have played this game before, Kakyoin.
I do not need to answer that.
Get your machine back on the course and start!
It is not possible by simply having experience in F-Mega.
Although he looks rather anxious on the outside,
he has a very bold personality.
They are right next to each other!
Kakyoin ended up on the outside.
If they hit a curve side by side, the outside car is at a disadvantage.
Only three seconds to the first corner!
It is possible to take the corner at this speed!
I am going to bust through that corner at full throttle!
They turned that corner at the same speed and at the same time!
I have taken a liking to you, Kakyoin!
You wagered your soul, but you are not scared at all!
You rise above fear to work the controls.
Only people like you, who give me competition,
are worthy of being a part of my doll collection.
Six months ago, when I met your master, Dio...
When he planted the flesh bud in my brain,
I was trained to withstand fear.
The moment I encountered Dio, honestly, I was terrified of the beast he was.
I lost feeling in my legs, every hair on my body stood on end,
When I saw Dio and realized I could not move,
the paralysis made my hairs stand even more on end.
My stomach convulsed, and I had acid reflux.
As he looked at me, Dio said this to me.
His voice was gentle, as if speaking to a child.
I felt relief from the bottom of my heart.
I thought I could stay alive!
I cursed myself for giving in to him.
Jotaro saved me, and that was the reason I went on this journey.
I will never return to being that pathetic Kakyoin ever again!
D'Arby, that is exactly why I am wagering my soul with you in this challenge.
That is why I, Noriaki Kakyoin,
will not make any nervous mistakes with my controls.
They are going through all of them the same time!
Once you are through the sixth corner, you will see a speed tunnel.
As soon as you are through the tunnel,
you will be able to go twice as fast, up to 850km.
No matter what, I must go through that tunnel!
But the tunnel is only wide enough to accommodate one vehicle.
If they continue to race neck-and-neck,
one of them will not be able to enter the tunnel!
Kakyoin, do not let him push you out!
It seems you have not realized yet, Kakyoin.
Are you trying to push me out?
Take a look at your 28's remaining power.
you spun and were blown away by my blocking maneuver.
Did not you realize you had less energy after that?
Go into the tunnel after D'Arby!
If I let him enter the tunnel first, my chances of winning are gone.
I never guessed you would enter on the tunnel's wall.
I do not care how little power I have left.
I will take this next turn, even if only a hundredth of a second ahead of Kakyoin,
take the shortest course, even if it is by a thousandth of a millimeter,
and get through this tunnel even if it is but a moment faster!
We have to get through the tunnel in darkness from here.
Absolute darkness, where the radar is completely useless!
There are eight curves, one mine, and one cannon.
At the end of the darkness is the tunnel's exit.
One mistake and you will hit the wall.
But my body has memorized the timing needed to take the curves.
That is the sound of taking a corner.
I could see them in the light of the cannon blast!
They are coming out of the tunnel!
He is ahead by a length!
I will never let down my guard.
You have less power than I!
I know the rules of baseball.
It is impossible to back out now!
You should offer encouragement at times like this.
